column1: #Text=Sokka says : " If you think we 're going to fit through there , you 're crazier than that king . "
#Text=Aang says : " We ca n't , but Momo can ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Momo , I need you to find Appa and bust us outta here ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Go on , boy , get Appa ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Eh , how was Appa supposed to save us anyway ? "
